derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: Spanish, literally mountain', also heap of cards left after dealing' (from an earlier game of chance played with forty-five cards)

means.word_mean: 1. a gambling card game of Spanish origin; 3 or 4 cards are dealt face up and players bet that one of the will be matched before the others as the cards are dealt from the pack one at a time
